Title: Stealing Sunrise
Writer: Michael Jason Allen (screenplay), Michael Jason Allen (story)
Actors: Rhett Ashley Crosby, Michael Jason Allen, DeAnna Cali, Andrew DeCarlo
Plot: In 1986, four criminal friends attempt to make enough money to escape their dreary city and retire in a beach town 800 miles away. They must pull a series of "jobs" to afford them this, but is there enough room and money for all four?
